title: Need help. Guess the fonts on the picture
content:
Please, gurus and masters, I need your help. What fonts should I search for to find that ones on the picture? They’re from 50s, I guess...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [old-radio.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102222306/http:/typophile.com/files/old-radio.png) | 75 KB |

 [‹ Galaxy Polaris](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102222306/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33773 "Go to previous forum topic") [Seeking advice on designing and learning in NorCal ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102222306/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33755 "Go to next forum topic")
author: oddy

comments.content: Perhaps [Franklin Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102222306/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/itc_franklin_gothic_demi/&sample_text=CARRIER%20LEVEL&sample_size=36). The logo is probably hand lettered.
